TopicTitle: New to KSP and Linux (Mint) a very Kerbalistic Quest

Articles.Content: New to Linux (Mint) and even newer to KSP.  Attempting to install in Linux, however, per the Readme I am looking for the install scipt (dlc-mhe-[lang].command) and cannot find it...  Help!!!   Maybe too much new at one time, but that wouldn't be very Kerbalistic...would it?  And then there is CKan....

Greetings!

I too am running Linux Mint, however I have no idea about the command you're talking about.  Where did you get the game from?  I have it from GoG, which is packaged in very neat single .sh files for installation, which just need to marked as executable and run.

Ckan won't help you install the game or DLC, it's just for community-made mods.
